info.title: Configuring virtual machines to use VXLAN

abstract.para: This topic describes how to configure an existing virtual machine to use a VXLAN via a network bridge.

topic.para: Virtual machines (VMs) need to use the virtual network vxlan1-br0 to communicate via a network bridge with an attached VXLAN network. Run the following procedure on &productnameshort; hosts to change the network of an existing VM.

listitem.para: You configured the virtual network vxlan1-br0 using &libvirt;.

step.para: Connect the network interface of the VM to the virtual network vxlan1-br0.
Verify the virtual network interfaces on the host and interface attached to the vxlan1-br0 network bridge.
